display_long_description:
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. Immerse yourself in a fast-paced, action-packed VR experience where survival hinges on your ability to adapt, upgrade, and overpower relentless enemies.
[media]
# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
[media]
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 
[media]
**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
[media]
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
[media]
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
[media]
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.

The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. Immerse yourself in a fast-paced, action-packed VR experience where survival hinges on your ability to adapt, upgrade, and overpower relentless enemies.

# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=35HNhB3IjLUQ7kNvwEVoWZs&_nc_oc=AdlYOFi_C6FRsNlFyzZjv0XMFPBEnXi-rb0TaP75EUHDPJ4niiWJ3fzp0NGaY80lTFo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SSRxBqlUNqgXaIDVwHf6_g&oh=00_AfH2mUDkrmc998gBFB_ehZADyrIbKhEtHvCm17yGq4NZtA&oe=6819DC09)
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75416840_1360911681979177_4029700482968298444_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Mj7CNbhXPA0Q7kNvwGWUJIs&_nc_oc=AdkkY8_ipHVcp60kj7-E9u6gJtqT2RbgTTqNgJg3K9mIBZpFshu3ZxxwAMH3AcHHw_c&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SSRxBqlUNqgXaIDVwHf6_g&oh=00_AfEyr9ZR9eMAiCgICcuFXnHJ6wnV0UBjc3Me9ncq5eEzhQ&oe=6819DA21)
**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ned8n5w0YU0Q7kNvwE6isXA&_nc_oc=AdnA_Ll2t1N0QyaEhUnOSoxUhdiVG34fjpHRREt9T4x0eBqeGAUR7UIAqs6m_0pRlGM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SSRxBqlUNqgXaIDVwHf6_g&oh=00_AfGxiZdiEdNaBUu3av35EBR7L6VZH6W_g5M7Ar4PbQrsUg&oe=6819E95D)
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=eUUETvVbZDsQ7kNvwGV1X2g&_nc_oc=AdlrVOXZW7KZQjWzw4aMwtoALteIAHmCDXN9XTMFyBjbUimeqsP_cJCqf1F2XO6te6k&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SSRxBqlUNqgXaIDVwHf6_g&oh=00_AfEun2IAJK5qH--JdJ9aEkPYOK8ILOH0hYL-9JD-J21enQ&oe=681A0F52)
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lMHtH0FmLOgQ7kNvwEfW9Y7&_nc_oc=Adm8ekeMAJGXwM2p56NMoqtSos9YCCrhrFggyaYxuj1i35c_KuI4rjkD3JcwGVUFWvQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SSRxBqlUNqgXaIDVwHf6_g&oh=00_AfG-0Q5YqQbMS3ZAetbst3geBhwkduUou1KQ7VgJdIyM0g&oe=6819F142)
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.
